name: Agent Sharpshooter
description:
You're the agent with the best aim and most successful missions. Cleaning up the city's streets is a job for you and you alone.

Save the innocent citizens from the dark underbelly of organized crime in the city. One by one, you will take out your targets and make the city a little bit safer.

Watch out for hidden enemies who will start to hide as you get better at hunting down the criminals. Your targets will be blown away by your speed and accuracy, and also by your bullets. Crime will not rest, so neither should you. Get to work, agent!

Agent Sharpshooter features:
- Lethal upgrades for weapons
- Tons of awesome environments to explore
- Cool enemies to defeat
